response.summary:
I’m an Electronic Engineer and Project Management Specialist. Thanks to the activities developed at TechnipFMC offices in Italy, I have gained international experience in electric, instrumentation, and automation equipment procurement area. I have led multidisciplinary working teams in Large-scale international projects of the Oil & Gas sector. I can manage local and global suppliers, carry out negotiations, perform commercial analysis, and execute procurement strategies following the Project Management guidelines. 
I’m passionate about continuous learning and new challenges, acting under strict moral and ethical values.
response.skills: Liderazgo, Análisis comercial , Gestión de proveedores, Instrumentación electrónica, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Excel, Negociación, Gestión de proyectos, Compras, Adquisiciones, Gestión de compras, Petróleo y gas natural, Software ERP, Planificación de recursos empresariales (ERP)

profile_positions.description:
Ejecutar procesos de compra de equipos y contratación de servicios, mediante solicitud de cotizaciones (RFP, RFI, RFQ) a proveedores nacionales e internacionales, en el marco del desarrollo de nuevos proyectos EPC de cogeneración y de energías renovables. 

Reportar periódicamente al cliente interno y la gerencia de proyectos, mediante indicadores KPI, el avance de emisión de órdenes de compra y entrega de material, garantizando el cumplimiento de los acuerdos contractuales.
profile_positions.title: Analista de compras y contrataciones II

profile_positions.description:
Expedite the material supply cycle, from purchase order placement to delivery at site. Coordinate with the supplier and engineering department the documentation submission and approval. Monitoring suppliers' manufacturing progress, inspection notifications, and material dispatch. Support the project management team reporting the supplier work progress, identifying potential slippages and mitigation plans to ensure the ROS dates accomplishment. 
Projects:
BAPCO: Refinery expansion and modernization – Sitra, Bahrein – Onshore EPC project.
profile_positions.title: Expeditor

profile_positions.description:
Develop the electric and automation bulk supply acquiring process: Bidder list formulation, commercial negotiation and alignment, quotation analysis, vendor selection, and purchase order emission, following the project’s technical, commercial, and contractual obligations. 
Projects:
-    MIDOR: Refinery expansion – Alexandria, Egypt – Onshore EPC project. 
-    BAPCO: Refinery expansion and modernization – Sitra, Bahrein – Onshore EPC project.
profile_positions.title: Buyer

profile_positions.description:
Developing automation and instrumentation projects. Providing training to students and researchers focused on laboratory practices that require measurement, data acquisition, and signal processing, using specialized instrumentation software and hardware.
Remarks:
- Developing an embedded differential pressure measurement and data acquisition prototype system for fluid dynamics studies in wind tunnels.
- Automation of triggering, measurement, and data acquisition of a Split Hopkinson pressure bar for ballistic materials studies.
profile_positions.title: Instrumentation and Automation Leader

company.name: Technip Energies
company.description:
Technip Energies is a leading Engineering & Technology company for the energy transition, with leadership positions in Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG), hydrogen and ethylene as well as growing market positions in blue and green hydrogen, sustainable chemistry and CO2 management. The company benefits from its robust project delivery model supported by extensive technology, products and services offering. 
Operating in 34 countries, our 15,000 people are fully committed to bringing our client’s innovative projects to life, breaking boundaries to accelerate the energy transition for a better tomorrow.
Technip Energies is listed on Euronext Paris with American depositary receipts (“ADRs”). For further information: www.technipenergies.com.
